name: Sequence:r
description:
This is an early gameplay demo of Sequence:r - a minimalistic, procedurally generated rhythm game, featuring a variety of game modes and many ways to customise its aesthetic appearance. It can be something to calm your mind after a stressful day, a fun evening with your friends or it can be a tough challenge for anyone familiar with other rhythm games like Osu! or Stepmania.

Anyone interested in the game and how it is made can join me over at Patreon, where I offer a deeper insight into my design / thought / learning process.

https://www.patreon.com/unicaegames

Thank you for playing,
Danny from Unicae Games
